topic.title: Discuss (U7): Air Pollution
topic.text:
Air pollution has been a significant problem for the U.S. and other industrialized countries dating back to the industrial revolution in the 1800s.

A new wave of industrial revolution is occurring in the Far East. Currently China is experiencing toxic clouds; and regions in India are burning raw materials in open furnaces for mineral production (related to making steel).

With the knowledge of the atmosphere and weather you have gained in your reading of recent chapters in the text,

  • Describe what you see as a potential impact of this on the U.S.
  • Describe how you think this could affect the economy of the U.S.

Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
